DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of the study is to investigate whether ingestion of acetaminophen reduces the experience of hurt feelings.
DOC.brief_title: Effects of Acetaminophen on Hurt Feelings
DOC.criteria: University of Toronto undergraduate psychology student Alcohol consumption (more than 2 drinks per day) Intake of enzymeinducing drugs Prolonged fasting/eating disorders/gastroenteritis Intake of other overthecounter or prescription analgesics Liver Disorders History of abuse treatment
